articles.author: Nic Wirtz, Mary Beth Sheridan
articles.title: Guatemala court suspends anticorruption Semilla party of Bernardo Arévalo - The Washington Post
articles.description: The United States warned that the Central American country's democracy is again in peril.
articles.content:

GUATEMALA CITY Guatemala was plunged into a political crisis on Thursday when a court disqualified the party of a maverick anti-corruption candidate just weeks before … [+5807 chars]
